Greetings from ZionVPS - http://zionvps.com



Company info: We are a relatively new company. We have been providing openvz and kvm offers since 2 months. The registration as a LLP is already under process and should take no more than one month.  We specialize in providing affordable servers. We are dedicated to run the business, and prepared for financial liabilities in upcoming months. At first, we plan to rent dedicated servers, until all the legal obligations are cleared, then we will start co locating at different locations with our own hardware.

Offer info: Today we are  here to offer openvz servers. The nodes are located in Montreal, Canada. Node specs are AMD Operaton CPU, 32 or 64 GB ram, 4x2tb hard disks raided 0+1, bandwidth upgraded to 1.5Gbps. All the following plans are unmanaged, however management and cpanel are offered as an addon. Management is reactive, and done via skype. The node is hosted in OVH datacenter. Offshore backups are taken everyday on each node via FTP, and we will soon implement features allowing clients to backup their system on their own.
